author: Adam Satariano, Davey Alba, Adam Satariano, Davey Alba
title: Coronavirus 5G conspiracy theory fuels arson attacks across Britain
description: More than 30 acts of arson and vandalism have taken place against wireless towers and other telecom gear this month, according to police reports and a telecom trade group
content:
A wireless tower was set ablaze in Birmingham on 2 April. The next day, a fire was reported at 10pm at a telecommunications box in Liverpool. An hour later, an emergency call came in about another cell tower in Liverpool that was going up in flames.
Across B… [+14547 chars]
